description:
'''Short description:'''
For the Antarctic Sea - A sea ice concentration product based on satellite SAR imagery and microwave radiometer data: The algorithm uses SENTINEL-1 SAR EW and IW mode dual-polarized HH/HV data combined with AMSR2 radiometer data.

'''DOI (product) :'''   
https://doi.org/10.48670/mds-00320
title: Antarctic Ocean - High Resolution Sea Ice Information

providers.name: Copernicus Marine Service
providers.description: Copernicus Marine Service - Mercator Ocean International
